thread.title: Hollywoods Top 20 Interior Designers

title: Hollywoods Top 20 Interior Designers
text:
Hollywood's Top 20 Interior Designers 
Hollywood Reporter Saturday 24th October, 2015 
It's not only the town's residential compounds that are getting supersized: Decorating budgets also are leaping higher, and client demands right along with them. Gone (mostly) are the days when designers were hired for their signature stamp; L.A. clients now want to express their own design DNA with a decorator summoned to interpret. 
Consider Ellen DeGeneres, Ellen Pompeo and Fox co-chairman Stacey Snider: Each is looking for a partner rather than a permanent court decorator, which is why they've worked with more than one of the talents on this list - chosen for their design ...
